Derek Hon

Computer Scientist | Photographer | Hobbyist Artist

About Me

I am a 5th year undergraduate student at Brock University studying Computer Science, with prospects for Post Graduate i.e. Masters. I am to study Genetic Programming with a concentration on the usage on the visual arts. I have been a hobbyist artist for 2+ years, and have done freelance work for Digital Art a few times in the past few years. I am pursuing multiple forms of photography in landscape, portrait, and different forms of framing. I have been a freelance photographer for 1 year now, having done events within my University's club and for other clients.

Art

Computer Science

Github

I have most interest as a AI Developer and a Android Developer. Within AI I will be starting my Masters in Genetic Programming January 2021 and have had experience making Genetic Programming applications through the use of ECJ. As an Android Developer, I have uploaded 1 application to the Google Play Store as a test. This application uses OCR to recognize receipt values and use these values to calculate expenses monthly and yearly. They would also store an image of these receipts as reference and organize them per month for viewing simplicity. The OCR framework used is a freely obtainable framework. This app has a very barebones UI and has no future plans as of right now as it was a project for fun.

Receipt Tracker Application
